Game.howToPlay: HOW TO PLAY HOW TO PLAY
Game.howToPlayContent:
Press the Stop button to stop the spinning discs and reveal YOUR LETTERS. Press the Stop button to stop the spinning discs and reveal YOUR NUMBERS.

Select the crossword letters that match YOUR LETTERS to mark them as matched. Select the crossword letters that match YOUR LETTERS to mark them as matched.

An extra letter will be awarded if the Pink Diamond lands in the correct position. An extra letter will be awarded if the Pink Diamond lands in the correct position.

Match all letters in 3 to 10 words to win! Match all letters in 3 to 10 words to win!

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game.
